Name: Truffle Saga
About the game: From the makers of Commando Jack, comes Truffle Saga! Take Truffle on a cool adventure to rid the forest of angry Mushrooms in a fun addicting physics puzzler! Truffle needs your help, and has acorns ready to throw at the pesky Mushrooms to destroy them! You have to do it in one shot, I bet you can't, though Truffle will be happy if you do! Stop the Mushrooms taking over the forest now in this addictive saga! - 60 levels to complete - Complete each level 4 different ways to Crown it! - Achievements! For more info, visit www.colossalgames.eu
